DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two luteal support protocol In vitro fertilization patient ( IVF ) risk develop ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) . We would like determine whether luteal Decapeptyl day 3 , 6,9 post ovulation trigger good low dose hCG day 3 post triggering..
DOC.brief_title: Comapring Luteal Phase Support IVF Patients Who Are High Risk Developing OHSS
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial study two luteal support protocol In vitro fertilization patient ( IVF ) treat GnRH antagonist ( GnRH ant ) protocol risk develop ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) . The randomization procedure perform third party hospital use randomization table : patient fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion give informed consent randomize one two arm . This study include intervention affect ovarian stimulation solely intended test post ova pickup period . One arm treat luteal Decapeptyl day 3 , 6,9 post ovulation trigger . Second arm treat low dose hCG day 3 post triggering . All patient recruit treat acceptable IVF indication Meir medical center ( MMC ) registry computerize general system MMC . For purpose study use data patient recruit study give informed consent . Each patient recruit unique study identity ( ID ) . The patient ' information pool computerize file Excel spread sheet : Excel file name erase unique study ID appear . The information regard cod key kept hard copy lock room inside IVF unit special study folder . The study approve MMC institutional Helsinki board . The data retrieve patient unique study include basic variable monitor every IVF cycle : Estradiol serum level ( E2 ) , Progesterone serum level ( P ) , number follicle count trans-vaginal ultrasound , endometrial thickness measure trans-vaginal ultrasound , Follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) dosing , number stimulation day , number egg retrieve , fertilization rate , blastulation rate , number embryo transfer , embryo quality , positive pregnancy test , implantation rate , presence clinical pregnancy , presence OHSS . Since mandatory variable treatment expect miss data . In addition mandatory data study patient perform two additional blood test day 3 post ovum pickup transfer day ( day 5 post ovum pickup ) include Estradiol serum level ( E2 ) Progesterone serum level ( P ) . Outcome measure : Day transfer Progesterone serum level , OHSS rate , implantation rate , clinical pregnancy rate . Sample size calculation base Kol S et al 2015 , regard day transfer Progesterone level ( pooled standard deviation : 40nmol/L ) , alpha 5 % , 80 % power , non-inferiority study require 22 patient group total 44 patient . Once include expect 10 % chance freeze population include 50 patient . Statistical analysis : Analysis data perform use SPSS 23.0 computer package ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL ) . Normally distribute data analyze student test . Ï‡2 Fisher 's exact test use comparison rate proportion . All P value test two-sided consider significant less 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: IVF treatment GnRH antagonist protocol GnRH agonist trigger ovulation High risk OHSS express either E2 serum level > 2500 pg/ml background maternal morbidity Any protocol GnRH antagonist protocol hCG trigger ovulation E2 serum level > 4500 pg/ml Aspiration > 25 ova Embryo transfer prior day 5
